title: Odd Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Italian, Japanese, Western, Beer/Wine, Bar Food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This is a pub, located in the Northern Quarter, serves many vegan and vegetarian options, which are clearly labeled on the menu. Vegan mayo is available and all vegetarian options can be made vegan. Informal dining, comfy couches and bar seating.
